description: This is an HTML source file for a front-end web application that provides a user interface for browsing databases, viewing tables, and displaying table data dynamically. It includes embedded CSS styles and JavaScript scripts to handle interaction, data fetching, and UI updates.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the backend API and populates the database list in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by re-fetching data from the backend.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database to show its tables, loading tables when expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads the list of tables for a selected database from the backend API.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays the data of a selected table, rendering it in a tabular format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display table data in a structured, scrollable table with headers.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates individual table cell HTML, handling nulls, objects, and long strings with expand/collapse functionality.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell displaying long content or objects, toggling between summaries and full details.
